name: Garuda Emblem
description:
Garuda Emblem is a 2D Free Roam Beat 'Em Up where you can explore the world of Garuda Emblem, talk to people, do various quest and beat some enemies. With lots of mystery and conflict to solve, your adventure awaits!

Welcome to UNION!

  UNION, otherwise known as University of Rungeon, is one of the biggest universities in Rungeon City. It boasts a large number of study programs and technological advancement, while producing people with special skill as well. However, not all parts of UNION are as flawless as people see it.

Meet Farid, the new student!

     
Explore UNION as Farid. Discover new places, collect data, and find the secrets behind the mysteries he encounters. Take the opportunity to visit and meet some new people on Farid's first day!

However, a crisis appears!

    Unknown city gangsters suddenly barged into the university to wreak havoc! Farid has no choice but to handle the situation, classic action movie style!

Dynamic Combo Mechanics allows Farid to utilize a variety of attacks and skills to beat the bad guys!

Keep your toes on the ground! Since it's a street fight, use your surrounding for your advantages!

No rules! Use anything as your weapon. Do everything you can to survive!


A good fighter is capable of maintaining a good diet! Consume foods and drinks along the way, there might be something you need inside them, Oh, don't forget to pay though, they're not free!

Did Farid managed to survive?

Play now and find out yourself!

Features
  • Free-roam Open World, with secrets and hidden easter eggs.
  • Hyper-comical beat 'em up with juicy combos.
  • Hand-drawn sprites, environment, as well as effects and animation.
  • Dynamic environment to experiment with traps and other weapons.
  • Learn new abilities and skills from fights to develop your characters.
  • 2 player local co-op.*
  • Character selection and customization (skill tree and equipment).*
  • Day and night cycle.*
  • Various side quest and mini games.*
  • More places to explore, more enemies to face, and more mysteries waiting to be solved!*

*available only in full version (currently in development).

Garuda Emblem supports Xbox controllers and mostly other generic USB joysticks.
